SIGMA is a space exploration game that aims to make you experience space travel at a larger, more authentic scale.


SIGMA was made for Hits Playtime by:

  • Pol Clarissou (code)
  • Heloise Lozano (sound)
  • Flex Roman (art)
  • Typhaine Uro (art)
  • with the help of Yadoob (art) and Pierre Lacomme (sound)
